name: Broadnet SMS Services
author: broadnet.me

sections.description:
This plugin adds a new feature to your WooCommerce site. With it, you can easily do integrate sms notifications in orders notifications.

Support

If you need help with the Broadnet SMS Services Plugin, please visit our support forum at noc@broadnet.me.

License

The Broadnet SMS Services Plugin is released under the GPLv2 license. A copy of the license can be found in the LICENSE file.
sections.installation:
Download the plugin files and save them to your WordPress plugins directory.

In the WordPress administration panel, go to the “Plugins” section and click “Activate” next to the Broadnet SMS Services Plugin.

Configure the plugin by going to the admin sidebar section and clicking “WooCommerce SMS” menu.

After opening default settings page. For testing use default demo account’s Request URL, Source Number (sid) & Access Key in form of input fields shared in “Demo Account Setup Information” section.

For getting yours account associated Request Url, Source Number (sid) and Access key, Kindly contact Broadnet SMS Services’s support at noc@broadnet.me
sections.faq:
How do I get started with the Broadnet SMS Services WordPress Plugin?

Simply install and activate the plugin, and then configure it to suit your needs.

short_description: A plugin for sending SMS notification to customers and administrator when orders status is changed using WooCommerce.
